languages.text: Мощные жвалы гигантских гадин превращают тела солдат в кровавую кашу, и кошмарный бой с неизвестными ксеноформами длится, кажется, целую вечность. Но ничто не в силах устоять перед очистительным пламенем огнеметов — чудовища отступают в скрытые гнезда, призывая на подкрепление новые волны сородичей стрекотом омерзительных жвал. Не имея сил и времени проститься с павшими товарищами, выжившие в спешке обрушивают проходы в гнездовье и, подавленные, продолжают нелегкий путь.

traits.locale_text: Мощные жвалы гигантских гадин превращают тела солдат в кровавую кашу, и кошмарный бой с неизвестными ксеноформами длится, кажется, целую вечность. Но ничто не в силах устоять перед очистительным пламенем огнеметов — чудовища отступают в скрытые гнезда, призывая на подкрепление новые волны сородичей стрекотом омерзительных жвал. Не имея сил и времени проститься с павшими товарищами, выжившие в спешке обрушивают проходы в гнездовье и, подавленные, продолжают нелегкий путь.

languages.text: Powerful mandibles turn soldiers' bodies into a bloody paste, and the nightmarish battle against unknown xenoforms seems to last an eternity. However, nothing can withstand the purifying light of flamers — the horrors finally retreat into hidden nests, calling new waves of their kind as reinforcements by rattling their disgusting mandibles. Lacking the strength and time to bid a final farewell to their fallen comrades, the survivors hasten to bring down the entrances to the nest and morosely continue their difficult journey.

Но ничто не в силах устоять перед очистительным пламенем огнеметов — чудовища отступают в скрытые гнезда, призывая на подкрепление новые волны сородичей стрекотом омерзительных жвал. However, nothing can withstand the purifying light of flamers — the horrors finally retreat into hidden nests, calling new waves of their kind as reinforcements by rattling their disgusting mandibles. Lacking the strength and time to say goodbye to their fallen comrades, the survivors hasten to bring down the entrances to the next and morosely continue their difficult journey.

Powerful mandibles turn soldiers' bodies into a bloody paste, and the nightmarish battle against unknown xenoforms seems to last an eternity. However, nothing can withstand the purifying light of flamers — the horrors finally retreat into hidden nests, calling new waves of their kind as reinforcements by rattling their disgusting mandibles. Lacking the strength and time to bid a final farewell to their fallen comrades, the survivors hasten to bring down the entrances to the nest and morosely continue their difficult journey.

languages.text: 那些怪物强而有力的下颚将士兵们的躯体咬成了鲜血淋漓的浆糊。这场与未知异形噩梦般的战斗似乎永远都不会结束，然而，没有任何怪物能抵挡火焰喷射器的净化之光！那些恐怖的怪物最终撤回了隐藏的巢穴，下颚发出了令人作呕的声响，召唤同类进行增援。幸存者们没有精力，也没有时间向死去的同伴们作最后的告别。他们赶紧炸毁了巢穴的入口，一个个愁眉苦脸，继续踏上了这场艰难的旅程。
languages.original_text: Powerful mandibles turn soldiers' bodies into a bloody paste, and the nightmarish battle against unknown xenoforms seems to last an eternity. However, nothing can withstand the purifying light of flamers — the horrors finally retreat into hidden nests, calling new waves of their kind as reinforcements by rattling their disgusting mandibles. Lacking the strength and time to bid a final farewell to their fallen comrades, the survivors hasten to bring down the entrances to the nest and morosely continue their difficult journey.

traits.locale_text: 那些怪物强而有力的下颚将士兵们的躯体咬成了鲜血淋漓的浆糊。这场与未知异形噩梦般的战斗似乎永远都不会结束，然而，没有任何怪物能抵挡火焰喷射器的净化之光！那些恐怖的怪物最终撤回了隐藏的巢穴，下颚发出了令人作呕的声响，召唤同类进行增援。幸存者们没有精力，也没有时间向死去的同伴们作最后的告别。他们赶紧炸毁了巢穴的入口，一个个愁眉苦脸，继续踏上了这场艰难的旅程。

languages.text: 強力な大あごが兵士たちの体を血まみれのペーストにしてしまう。未知の異形との悪夢のような戦いは永遠に続くかのようだ。しかし、火炎放射器の浄めの光に耐えられる者はいない。敵はついに隠れた巣に退却し、大あごで不快な音をガタガタ鳴らして同類の群れを増援として呼び寄せる。倒れた仲間に最後の別れを告げる力も時間もないまま、生存者たちは急いで巣の入り口を壊し、困難な旅を続ける。
languages.original_text: Powerful mandibles turn soldiers' bodies into a bloody paste, and the nightmarish battle against unknown xenoforms seems to last an eternity. However, nothing can withstand the purifying light of flamers — the horrors finally retreat into hidden nests, calling new waves of their kind as reinforcements by rattling their disgusting mandibles. Lacking the strength and time to bid a final farewell to their fallen comrades, the survivors hasten to bring down the entrances to the nest and morosely continue their difficult journey.

traits.locale_text: 強力な大あごが兵士たちの体を血まみれのペーストにしてしまう。未知の異形との悪夢のような戦いは永遠に続くかのようだ。しかし、火炎放射器の浄めの光に耐えられる者はいない。敵はついに隠れた巣に退却し、大あごで不快な音をガタガタ鳴らして同類の群れを増援として呼び寄せる。倒れた仲間に最後の別れを告げる力も時間もないまま、生存者たちは急いで巣の入り口を壊し、困難な旅を続ける。

languages.text: Las poderosas mandíbulas convierten los cuerpos de los soldados en una pasta sanguinolenta, y la espantosa batalla contra xenoformas desconocidas parece durar una eternidad. Sin embargo, nada puede resistir la luz purificadora de los lanzallamas: los horrores finalmente se retiran a nidos ocultos, llamando a nuevas oleadas de su especie como refuerzos al hacer sonar sus repugnantes mandíbulas. Sin fuerzas ni tiempo para dar el último adiós a sus camaradas caídos, los supervivientes se apresuran a derribar las entradas del nido y prosiguen malhumorados su difícil viaje.
languages.original_text: Powerful mandibles turn soldiers' bodies into a bloody paste, and the nightmarish battle against unknown xenoforms seems to last an eternity. However, nothing can withstand the purifying light of flamers — the horrors finally retreat into hidden nests, calling new waves of their kind as reinforcements by rattling their disgusting mandibles. Lacking the strength and time to bid a final farewell to their fallen comrades, the survivors hasten to bring down the entrances to the nest and morosely continue their difficult journey.

traits.locale_text: Las poderosas mandíbulas convierten los cuerpos de los soldados en una pasta sanguinolenta, y la espantosa batalla contra xenoformas desconocidas parece durar una eternidad. Sin embargo, nada puede resistir la luz purificadora de los lanzallamas: los horrores finalmente se retiran a nidos ocultos, llamando a nuevas oleadas de su especie como refuerzos al hacer sonar sus repugnantes mandíbulas. Sin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}fuerzas{/g} ni tiempo para dar el último adiós a sus camaradas caídos, los supervivientes se apresuran a derribar las entradas del nido y prosiguen malhumorados su difícil viaje.{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}

languages.text: Starke Zähne verarbeiten die Körper der Soldaten zu einem blutigen Brei, und der albtraumhafte Kampf gegen die unbekannten Xenoformen scheint eine Ewigkeit zu dauern. Doch nichts kann dem läuternden Licht eines Flammenwerfers standhalten — die Monster ziehen sich schließlich wieder in ihre verborgenen Nester zurück und rufen neue Wellen ihrer Artgenossen als Verstärkung, indem sie mit ihren widerlichen Zähnen klappern. Die Überlebenden haben nicht die Kraft, ihren gefallenen Kameraden einen würdigen Abschied zu bereiten. Sie bringen die Eingänge zu dem Nest schnell zum Einsturz und setzen ihre schwierige Reise in beklommener Stimmung fort.
languages.original_text: Powerful mandibles turn soldiers' bodies into a bloody paste, and the nightmarish battle against unknown xenoforms seems to last an eternity. However, nothing can withstand the purifying light of flamers — the horrors finally retreat into hidden nests, calling new waves of their kind as reinforcements by rattling their disgusting mandibles. Lacking the strength and time to bid a final farewell to their fallen comrades, the survivors hasten to bring down the entrances to the nest and morosely continue their difficult journey.

Doch nichts kann dem läuternden Licht eines Flammenwerfers standhalten — die Monster ziehen sich schließlich wieder in ihre verborgenen Nester zurück und rufen neue Wellen ihrer Artgenossen als Verstärkung, indem sie mit ihren widerlichen Zähnen klappern. Die Überlebenden haben nicht die Kraft, ihren gefallenen Kameraden einen würdigen Abschied zu bereiten. Sie bringen die Eingänge zu dem Nest schnell zum Einsturz und setzen ihre schwierige Reise in beklommener Stimmung fort.

languages.text: Les redoutables mandibules réduisent les corps des soldats à l'état de bouillie sanguinolente et le combat cauchemardesque contre ces xénomorphes inconnus jusqu'alors semble durer une éternité. Pour autant, rien ne résiste à la lumière purificatrice des lance-flammes, et les horreurs finissent par se replier dans leurs antres cachés, d'où elles appellent de nouvelles vagues de leurs congénères à grand renfort de claquements de mâchoires sinistres. N'ayant ni le temps ni la force nécessaires pour adresser un dernier adieu à leurs défunts camarades, les survivants se hâtent de saper les entrées de leurs nids avant de poursuivre leur effroyable périple, la mort dans l'âme.
languages.original_text: Powerful mandibles turn soldiers' bodies into a bloody paste, and the nightmarish battle against unknown xenoforms seems to last an eternity. However, nothing can withstand the purifying light of flamers — the horrors finally retreat into hidden nests, calling new waves of their kind as reinforcements by rattling their disgusting mandibles. Lacking the strength and time to bid a final farewell to their fallen comrades, the survivors hasten to bring down the entrances to the nest and morosely continue their difficult journey.
